Applied Regression in R

Author

Stacy DeRuiter, Calvin University

This site contains materials developed for statistics courses at Calvin University.

It contains tutorials and reference guides for using R/RStudio for reproducible research with Quarto, data visualization with ggformula, and applied regression using packages including glmmTMB, ggeffects, mgcv, and DHARMa.

Throughout the website, we will include many code examples. These code examples are live. You can edit the code and re-run it to see how things change.

Give it a try. Run the code below to calculate 1 + 1. Then see if you can get R to compute the product 3 * 5 in the code block below.

R Basics
